body.name: Finding Her Sweet Spots: A Reverse Harem Romance Novella (Fun & Filthy Series)
body.description: The gorgeous Sweet brothers are New York City’s most eligible bachelors. They're anyone’s dream come true. But they can’t be mine.I made a vow to myself to take control of my life and make all my dreams come true. And that was going pretty well… Until them.A decade younger than me, I tell myself they’re nice to me because we work well together in our graduate program. Nothing else.Until one night, I run into them at a very steamy club and normal rules don’t seem to apply.Surrender tastes sweet, but it can't be anything other than one night. Until they offer me a deal I simply can't refuse...FINDING HER SWEET SPOTS is an extra-extra-steamy reverse harem contemporary romance with lots of fun and light moments. HEA guaranteed! (While this book is part of a series, it also works as a standalone.) Happy reading! Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Three Times The Sweet Love
reviews.reviewText: First off, I just gotta say…that author note was hilarious & definitely set the tone for the book 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻😝 This was an entertaining short story that is all about reaching out & grabbing the unexpected opportunities that come our way. That’s exactly what the Sweet brothers do when they run into the older woman (by almost 10 years) they’ve all had their sights on while going to graduate school together. While Emily may be focused on her goals, she’s noticed the guys too, but she certainly didn’t think they had any serious interest in her. Well, guess what…after finding each other during a special Valentine’s event at a sex club, they’re all about to give into how they’re feeling, but can this new level to their feelings last in the light of day? This may be a short story, but it still gave enough character background to feel like I could connect & root for everyone finding their HEA, with the added advantage of a realistic timeline for that HEA to happen. There was also plenty of spice, but it didn’t overpower the storyline so that it felt like there was no plot. I love how Joya does such an amazing job of giving us full length novel feels in such a short time period. Can’t wait for what we get next ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Finding Her Sweet Spots
reviews.reviewText: The author's note definitely sets the tone for the wild ride you're about to endure! Finding Her Sweet Spots is short, steamy, and to the point. Emily is focused on her goals and her future. She is determined not to let anything stand in her way. That is until the Sweets brothers have other intentions. Can Emily let down her walls and let the Sweets in?I loved how even in a short novella Joya Lively gives us a story line sprinkled with tons of spice. Emily goes to a sex club for research and ends up diving into a new and fun adventure that she hopes will never end.If you're looking for something short and fun to read then definitely give Finding Her Sweet Spots a try! I loved this and read it in one sitting. It isn't often that you find an older female character who is driven. I was rooting for Emily to let her walls down and the Sweets brothers in! Definitely a fun read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can have it (and them) all!
reviews.reviewText: Emily is completing her MBA. Her study partners Deacon, Ben and Graham are 10 years her junior and insanely attractive.Emily is focused on getting her degree and starting her business. In the name of research she goes to sex club. The Sweet Brothers are also in attendance for a birthday celebration. Emily decides to give in to her desires being they are all masked.This is a fun, quick and sexy read! The Sweet Boys definitely know how to treat a woman.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Why have 1 brother when you can have 3 ?!
reviews.reviewText: 📚 4/5 🌶️ 4/5Emily is the best kind of Boss BabeI first would like to say I was SO HAPPY to read a book where our FMC is in her 30s & still figuring her life out. Such a breath of fresh air, it’s never too late to pursue your dreams (in your career field and in the bedroom 😘)*spoilers below*Graham + Deacon + Ben = a dream 🥵The scene in the sex club was 10/10We love men who prioritize their women 👀This was such a fun read where our FMC doesn’t need a man to be strong & successfulWhile our MMCs just want to see her thrive & want to love her 🫶🏼.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FMMM steamy story
reviews.reviewText: This is a fast read, with lots of steam. All the characters have chemistry. Three brothers all like the same person and have wanted her from the day they met. She has felt the same. She feels she is not the right person for them and is afraid of having her heart broken.You need to read the book to find out the how the story unfolds and whether they give in to their desires.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Charming story of what they all think is unrequited love. Little do they know.This being a novella, the author did a good job of world building in a short amount of time. I’d of like to know more if each MMC individual personalities but it works here. (Leaves room for a full length book)Strong FMC hits just perfect. She knows what she likes and wants and doesn’t out anything in front of her getting it.The spice is nice and not overly done. Readers are going to eat this up! And like it!.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good spice with a dash of sweet
reviews.reviewText: This book is good smut with a dash of sweet romance. Emily is a relatable FMC and her guys are adorable and hilarious.I really enjoyed this one and would read more books by this author.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick and fun
reviews.reviewText: This book was a quick fun read. I read it all in one sitting. A cute story that is well written and makes you feel like you could be in the room.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.
